verbose_text: Pyocyanin interacts with components of the mitochondrial electron transport chain, driving the dysregulated release of ROS, activation of mitochondrial acid sphingomyelinase, synthesis of mitochondrial ceramide, and the release of pro apoptotic cytochrome c from the intermembrane space.
evidence: Pyocyanin interacts with components of the mitochondrial electron transport chain, driving the dysregulated release of ROS
